sense.def:
Kadar neki običaj ali verovanje
prevails at a particular place or time
, je v določenem kraju ali obdobju normalno.

seg.quote: ...the traditions that have prevailed in Britain since the 17th century.
The prevailing view shifted still further.

sense.def:
Kadar neki predlog ali načelo
prevails
, ima velik vpliv ali je sprejeto.

seg.quote: In the end, common sense prevailed.
Political arguments had prevailed over economic sense.
